159374.「あら？ <pc>さんは\n すでに フィッシングコンテスト用の\n 釣り道具を:
Oh? You already have the fishing gear needed for the contest.
If it breaks or you need new ones, come and see me and I'll give you another rod and lure.

159376.「フィッシングコンテスト\n 絶賛開催中です！\n 何か ご用が おありですか？:
The fishing contest is now in full swing!
What can I do for you?<break>

159377.「あら……？ そうびぶくろが\n いっぱいみたいです。\n<br>\n「いったん:
Huh? Your equipment bag seems to be too full right now.
Make room for at least two items in your equipment bag first, and then come back to see me.

159378.<pipipi_on>「……なるほど。\n どうやら サイズの記録を\n 更新で:
I see...there aren't any fish that can break your record size.
Keep fishing up those <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> and make sure you show them to me!

159379.「この世界には もっと大きな\n <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>が いると思:
I think there's gotta be a bigger <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> out there somewhere.
As soon as you catch it, please make sure to come and bring it to me!

159380.「この<%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>は\n <%dL_SPFISH_SIZE:
This <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> exceeds

size reward!<end>

159381.「<%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>を\n 釣ってきたんですね！\n それでは:
You've caught <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>!
Let me just take a look at your fish bag...
<end>

159382.<pipipi_on>「……<%.1fL_MAXFISH_SIZE>ｃｍ！？\n:
<%.1fL_MAXFISH_SIZE> cm?! Amazing! Simply amazing!

Great job, ! I'll go ahead and update the record for your largest size!

159383.「わかりました。\n ランキングに 載る場合には\n 『ないしょ』と 表記します:

159393.「フフフ……私が作った\n フィッシングコンテスト用の \n 釣り道具が ほしい:
Hmm hmm...so you'd like the fishing gear I made specifically for this contest, huh?
Understood! Please take these with you!

159395.「他に 何か\n ご用は ありますか？\n<break>: Is there anything else I can do for you?<break>

159396.「フィッシングコンテストの\n ルールについて 何を\n 聞きたいですか？\n<:
What would you like to know about the rules
of the fishing contest?<break>

159397.「フィッシングコンテストとは\n 開催期間内に 旬のさかなを釣ってきてもらい\n:
A fishing contest is a competition to see who can catch the best fish of the season during the contest period. If you catch a fish in
season, we'll reward you according to its size, so first and foremost, show it to me... And more! If the size of your fish is in the
top 200 at the end of the contest, you'll get a huge reward! As a reminder, if you don't show me your fish in season, you won't be
rewarded by size, nor will you be ranked... So please don't forget to show me your seasonal fish when you catch them! Please be
very careful!

159398.「旬のさかなは 旬の釣りざおと\n 旬のルアーの組み合わせ 以外では\n 絶対に:
Please note that you will not be able to catch seasonal fish unless you use a Seasonal Fishing Rod and Seasonal Lure. If you use up
or lose your fishing tackle, I will give you a new one. ...And I have some information on seasonal fish that may be of interest to you.
It is said that when the weather is rough, the in-season fish are often seen in large schools, and you don't see many other fish in
that particular fishing spot. Maybe it's a good time to visit a fishing spot with in- season fish.

159400.「私に見せていただいた 旬のさかなは\n 参加者ごとに登録される 最大サイズで\:
The seasonal fish I was shown were ranked by the maximum size registered by each participant... At the end of the contest,
those who finish in the top 200 will be rewarded with cash and prizes at the end of the fishing contest! Who will be the first to
catch the biggest fish and reach the heights of fishing... Aah! I'm getting excited! Good luck! Please do your best to reach the top!

159401.「お題となっている 旬のさかなのうち\n 私に見せていただいた 最大サイズが\n:
Of the fish in season that are the subject of this article The largest size you've shown me That's a record for you, sir. At the end of the fishing contest, the top 200 fishermen will be declared the winners. The size
records will only be kept for the seasonal fish that have already been measured and shown to me, so please don't forget that!
Please make sure you don't forget to show me the fish you've caught, or you'll miss out! Also, if there are fish of the exact same
size registered, the person with the fastest time when I measure them will be ranked higher... The key to winning is to show me
your fish, even if it's just a second too big! If your size is in the top 200, you will be ranked... Your name will appear in the ranking... But if you don't want your name to appear in the rankings because you're embarrassed, you can
change your name to "Secret"... You can change the display of your name at any time, so please feel free to ask!

159402.「私に見せていただいた 旬のさかなのサイズが\n 一定以上の サイズだった場合\:
If the size of the seasonal fish you show me is above a certain size, I will reward you according to that size... As for the size
based rewards, I'll only give you one for each size you show me. We've set 12 different sizes, so please try your best to get bigger
fish!

159403.「あら……？ そうびぶくろが\n いっぱいみたいです。\n<br>\n「いったん:
Huh? Your equipment bag seems to be too full right now.
Make room for at least two items in your equipment bag first, and then come back to see me.

159404.「さすが 釣り老師が一目置いている\n <pc>さんです！\n そうこなくっちゃ:
That's what a master fisherman looks for It's the three of us! That's what I'm talking about! Now, let me explain the rules of the contest in brief... All you have to do is
catch a fish that's in season in a certain area, and show it to me. I will measure the size of the fish and rank the participants in
order of size... Furthermore, if the fish you show me are larger than a certain size, you will be rewarded according to that size...
Here's a list of the rewards we'll give out for each size...

159405.「あなたが <pc>さんですね！\n はじめまして！\n わたしの名前は ナツリ:
You're , aren't you? Nice to meet you! My name is Castina.
I'm a fisherman myself, and I explore the ways of fishing with Harmos, the fishing guru.
Actually, even though it probably doesn't look like it, I'm known as a fishing instructor. I hope I can do well!
Now, . What's about to begin is a fiery festival of fishing filled with skilled and enthusiastic anglers!
Did you know that some of the fish that inhabit Astoltia have something known as "peak season"?
During this "peak season", these fish can grow to an unimaginably large size!
Rumors say that these fish can be as big as five times their normal size...
As followers of fishing, there's no way we're gonna pass up this amazing opportunity to bag some huge catches!
That's why my da...I mean, Harmos...and his disciples will host this Fishing Contest!
So what do you think, ? Does this not make you want to join too?!

159406.「そうですか……\n 優先すべき 何かが\n <pc>さんには あるのですね……:
I see...I suppose you have your priorities, then...
But if you do change your mind, please come and let me know if you want to participate!

159407.「それでは\n 第１回フィッシングコンテスト\n 開催です！\n<br>\n「今:
And now for the first fishing contest! This year's theme, the fish of the season, is... <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>! And the place where
<%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> appears...! <%sL_SPFISH_CONTI1> <%sL_SPFISH_MAP1>! <%sL_SPFISH_CONTI2> <%sL_SPFISH_MAP2>!
<%sL_SPFISH_CONTI3> <%sL_SPFISH_MAP3>! There must be a <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> in one of these areas... If the size of the seasonal fish you
bring to me is within the top 200, you'll receive a generous reward at the end of the contest!

159408.「あ <pc>さん！\n ちょうど いいところに！\n<br>\n「じつは 新た:
Oh, ! You're just in time! It seems there's a new seasonal fish!
Do you feel it? That tingling sensation? Is that fiery fishing spirit burning inside of you?!

159409.「……ということで\n 第２回フィッシングコンテスト\n 開催です！\n<br>:
... That's why we're holding our second annual fishing contest! The theme for this year's contest is seasonal fish...
<%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>! And the fishing grounds where <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> appears are... <%sL_SPFISH_CONTI1> <%sL_SPFISH_MAP1>
<%sL_SPFISH_CONTI2> <%sL_SPFISH_MAP2> <%sL_SPFISH_CONTI3> <%sL_SPFISH_MAP3>! If there's a <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> in any of these
areas... If the size of the seasonal fish you bring to me is in the top 200 of the participants, you'll receive a huge reward at
the end of the contest!

159412.「はじめまして！\n 私は 釣り師範ナツリと 申します。\n<br>\n「このた:
Nice to meet you! My name is Master Fishing, Nutri. The Master's students will be holding a fishing contest... But... I see you are not yet a disciple of Master Halmos. If you'd like to enter the fishing contest, Pa... I mean... If you wish to
participate in the fishing contest, you must complete your apprenticeship with Halmos the Fishing Master and then come to me again...
If you enter the fishing contest, you'll be rewarded with all sorts of extras! Please join us... I'll be waiting!

<end>

160160.「こんにちは！\n 今は 旬のさかなの時期ではないため\n フィッシングコンテス:
Hello! As the fish are not in season right now, we will not be holding a fishing contest... We'll have to wait a little while
for the fish of the season to appear...

160161.「あ <pc>さん こんにちは！\n 前回の フィッシングコンテストは\n おか:
Oh, , hello! Thanks to you, the last contest was a lot of fun!
And, actually... it looks like the fish you caught won the top prize!!
So, without further ado, let me announce the rankings you have been so eagerly waiting for!
Let's see...

160162.「あ <pc>さん こんにちは！\n 前回の フィッシングコンテストは\n おか:

Sorry to say, but you didn't make it into the top rankings this time...
But don't let this get you down! Try your best next time so you can win!

160164.「……よし。\n これで前回までに 渡せていなかった\n サイズ別報酬は すべて:
..... Now we've given you all the rewards by
size that we didn't give you before... I hope
you catch a lot of big fish at this rate!<end>

160286.<pipipi_default>\n「今 お渡しした 釣り道具は\n 旬のさかな:

160289.「これで すべての報酬を お渡ししました！\n <pc>さん！\n 本当に おめ:
We've given you all your money! Congratulations! I'm so happy for you! Oh I guess my dad was right... I can't lose too... I can't lose! ... ... Oh, sorry... I'm getting too excited on my own... ...... I'm
sure you'll be able to find something that works for you.

160307.「……あ！\n<br>\n「ご……ごめんなさい <pc>さん……\n たった今:
... Oh! I'm... I'm sorry. Three... Registration for the fishing contest has just closed... Please feel free to use your <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> as a fish exchanger or
in an underfloor tank... Thank you very much for participating in this fishing contest! If there's ever another fishing contest, we'd
love to have you join us!

160407.「今回の 旬のさかなは\n <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>です。\n<br>:
This time, the fish of the season is <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM... And the place where <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> appears is...!
<%sL_SPFISH_CONTI1> <%sL_SPFISH_MAP1>! <%sL_SPFISH_CONTI2> <%sL_SPFISH_MAP2>! <%sL_SPFISH_CONTI3> <%sL_SPFISH_MAP3>! I'm
sure there are a few fishing spots in these areas, but good luck trying to find them!

160408.「注意事項として 旬のさかなを\n 私に見せるまでは 最大サイズは更新されず\n:
As a reminder, until you show me your fish in season, your maximum size will not be updated, and you will not be rewarded by
size. Of course, they won't be registered in the rankings either, so make sure you show them to me! By the way, after you show me
your seasonal fish... You're free to do as you please... And one of the characteristics of this seasonal fish is that, unlike most fish, it's only interested
in special fishing baits and lures... Unfortunately, the fishing tackle currently in circulation won't even catch it... So
where can I find the fishing tackle? ... Hmph! After much research, I've perfected the fishing tackle needed to catch the fish of
the season. This is for you, sir!

160603.「<pc>さん！ どうやら\n 今 お渡ししたもので サイズ別報酬は\n コンプ:
! What you've just given me completes the size rewards that I'm able to give to you!
But the Fishing Contest isn't over just yet!
Keep striving to catch even more of those <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> so you can crush the competition!

me! I'll be waiting for you!

the <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>... No matter how big your <%sL_SUBFISH_ITEM> is, unfortunately, you won't be rewarded with a ranking...

and This time, I have another piece of information that will ignite your fishing spirit! This time, I have another piece of

the characteristics of seasonal fish go beyond just being huge... These small in- season fish, which have been treated as mere
waste until now, are actually a major characteristic of in-season fish! So this time, we're holding a contest for the

We'd love to see you again in any Future Fishing contests we may have!

282264.「……あっと そういえば<pc>さんは\n ピタリ賞のお魚を\n 釣って いらっ:
...Oh, come to think of it...you've already caught a Perfect Size fish, haven't you?
Since you already have the <%sL_PRIZE_ITEM_PZ1>, you can have this as a reward instead!

282265.「……ということで\n 第６回フィッシングコンテスト\n 開催です！\n<br>:
... That's why we're holding the 6th Annual Fishing Contest! The theme for this year's contest is the fish of the season...
<%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>! And the fishing grounds where <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> appears are... <%sL_SPFISH_CONTI1> <%sL_SPFISH_MAP1>
<%sL_SPFISH_CONTI2> <%sL_SPFISH_MAP2> <%sL_SPFISH_CONTI3> <%sL_SPFISH_MAP3>! If there's a <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> in any of these
areas... If the size of the seasonal fish you bring to me is in the top 200 of the participants, you'll receive a huge reward at
the end of the contest!

282267.<pipipi_on>「上位入賞を 目指して\n がんばってくださいね！\n<b:
I hope you'll try your best to win the top prize! If there's anything else you want to know, I'll let you know later, so please feel
free to ask!

283052.「あとあと\n 今回も ピタリ賞がありますよ！\n<br>\n「これは 私が指定:
Also, this time, there's a Perfect Prize!
If you show me a fish that's the same exact size as the size I've specified, you'll win a special prize!
This time... the perfect size is <%.1fL_pitari_size> cm!
And for those who won the Perfect Prize or placed high in the rankings, there is a real-life prize available, too...
If you need more details, you can select "Hear Contest Rules"!

314935.「……ということで\n 第７回フィッシングコンテスト\n 開催です！\n<br>:
...and with that, the 7th Fishing Contest has officially begun!
The special fish to catch this year is...
<%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>!
As for where you can catch this fish, the locations are...
<%sL_SPFISH_CONTI1>: <%sL_SPFISH_MAP1>, <%sL_SPFISH_CONTI2>: <%sL_SPFISH_MAP2>, <%sL_SPFISH_CONTI3>: <%sL_SPFISH_MAP3>!
You should be able to catch <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> somewhere in any of these regions!
If the size of a fish you bring me is within top 200 of all participants, you'll win an amazing prize when the contest ends!

314937.<pipipi_on>「上位入賞を 目指して\n がんばってくださいね！\n<b:
I hope you'll try your best to win the top prize! If there's anything else you want to know, I'll let you know later, so please feel
free to ask!

314938.「……さらに！ このお魚は\n ピタリ賞の サイズでもありましたので\n こちら:
...and one last thing! This fish matches the Perfect Size, so I'll go ahead and update your record!
You really caught a Perfect Size fish... Perhaps the gods of fishing are smiling down upon you this day, !

314939.「１回の旬の時期に ２種類のさかな……\n 釣り道を 進むものとして\n いやが:
Two different species of fish in one season... it's a great way to get into fishing, isn't it? ...However, the fishing contest itself
will be based on the size of the <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> only. Unfortunately, no matter how big your <%sL_SUBFISH_ITEM> is, you
will not be rewarded for ranking in... However, <%sL_SUBFISH_ITEM> is necessary for researching seasonal fish, so we need a lot of
samples. We have prepared a separate reward for each size! Please catch <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> and <%sL_SUBFISH_ITEM> together!

314940.「そして <pc>さん！\n じつは もうひとつ\n 釣ってきてほしいものが あ:
And ! Actually, there is one more thing we'd like you to catch. It is <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>, which is rarely seen among
the schools of <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>. It is called <%sL_SUBFISH_ITEM>. It looks like a fish or a candy...but there is still little information
about it and it is still a mystery. So if you catch <%sL_SUBFISH_ITEM> as well as <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>, please come and show it to
me. Unfortunately, <%sL_SUBFISH_ITEM> will not be entered in the contest ranking as it will be used as a sample for seasonal fish research
surveys. Instead, we have prepared a small size-specific reward for <%sL_SUBFISH_ITEM>! Here are the rewards for <%sL_SUBFISH_ITEM> by
size!

314941.「ちなみに <%sL_SUBFISH_ITEM>も\n <%sL_FISH_RO:
Note that <%sL_SUBFISH_ITEM> can only be caught by <%sL_FISH_ROD> and <%sL_FISH_URE>. Ah... still, to have two rare fish appear at
the same time, in season... very exciting! ! If you catch <%sL_SUBFISH_ITEM>, please come and show it to
us!

314942.「そして <pc>さん。\n 今回は 釣り魂に火がつくような情報が\n もうひと:
And . This time, we have one more piece of information that is sure to ignite your fishing spirit! Our research on
in-season fish so far has revealed that the characteristics of in-season fish are not only that they become huge. Small in-season fish,
which until now have been treated as mere outcasts, are in fact a major characteristic of in-season fish! So this time, we are
holding a contest for the smallest size of <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>! Show us your <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> and we will register the
largest and smallest size in each ranking. The top 200 smallest size will also be rewarded with a great ranking! Don't forget to show me
your small <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> as well as your large <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>!

327752.<pipipi_on>「上位入賞を 目指して\n がんばってくださいね！\n<b:
I hope you'll try your best to win the top prize! If there's anything else you want to know, I'll let you know later, so please feel
free to ask!

344076.「あなたが <pc>さんですね！\n はじめまして！\n わたしの名前は ナツリ:
You're , aren't you? Nice to meet you! My name is Castina.
I'm a fisherman myself, and I explore the ways of fishing with Harmos, the fishing guru.
Actually, even though it probably doesn't look like it, I'm known as a fishing instructor. I hope I can do well!
Now, . What's about to begin is a fiery festival of fishing filled with skilled and enthusiastic anglers!
Did you know that some of the fish that inhabit Astoltia have something known as "peak season"?
During this "peak season", these fish can grow to an unimaginably large size!
Rumors say that these fish can be as big as five times their normal size...
As followers of fishing, there's no way we're gonna pass up this amazing opportunity to bag some huge catches!
That's why my da...I mean, Harmos...and his disciples will host this Fishing Contest!
So what do you think, ? Does this not make you want to join too?!

344077.「あ <pc>さん！\n ちょうど いいところに！\n<br>\n「じつは 新た:
Oh, ! You're just in time! It seems there's a new seasonal fish!
Do you feel it? That tingling sensation? Is that fiery fishing spirit burning inside of you?!

344080.「そして <pc>さん。\n 今回は 釣り魂に火がつくような情報が\n もうひと:
And . This time, we have one more piece of information that is sure to ignite your fishing spirit! Our research on
in-season fish so far has revealed that the characteristics of in-season fish are not only that they become huge. Small in-season fish,
which until now have been treated as mere outcasts, are in fact a major characteristic of in-season fish! So this time, we are
holding a contest for the smallest size of <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>! Show us your <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> and we will register the
largest and smallest size in each ranking. The top 200 smallest size will also be rewarded with a great ranking! Don't forget to show me
your small <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM> as well as your large <%sL_SPFISH_ITEM>!

<pipipi_off>
